ing: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A staple in our home. My kids and husband request this often! It goes well with spicy shrimp, Cajun-spiced halibut, or by itself with tortilla chips!"
ins: Stir the mango, red bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, green onion, lime zest, lime juice, vinegar, olive oil, salt and pepper together in a bowl. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes before serving.
